#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Introduction =

mr-common is a common *Java SE/EE framework*. Was develop with [http://commons.apache.org/ Apache common's], [http://www.springsource.org/ Spring] (Core, DAO, Security, Webflow, MVC), [http://www.hibernate.org/ Hibernate], and [http://www.eclipse.org/birt/ Birt Report].

Can be linked to develop Java SE, EE, or web applications.


== Details ==

The framework is divided into modules (jars):
  * [CommonCore mr-common-core]
  * [CommonDao mr-common-dao]
  * [CommonSecurity mr-common-security]
  * mr-common-security-userentity
  * mr-common-web
  * mr-common-birt

Each module is compiled with [http://maven.apache.org/ Apache Maven 2].

A application example is [http://apps.mrdev.com.ar/mr-common/ here] (_no source code available_). *User*: {{{admin}}}, *password*: {{{admin}}}.
